snippet.title: X-Men 2
snippet.description: Two different groups of mutants--one that struggles to coexist with the humans who despise them, and the other, which uses violence to accomplish their goals--confront a deadly new enemy whose machinations could change all of their lives.

snippet.title: X-Men 2
snippet.description: But now there is a new insidious enemy, and no one will be safe. . . . From the Paperback edition.

snippet.title: X-Men(tm) The Last Stand
snippet.description: Now, as the world trembles, the Phoenix slowly rises. . . From the Paperback edition.

snippet.title: X-Men Legends: Mutant genesis
snippet.description: The world is once again threatened by the X-Men's long-time nemesis, Magneto, now allied with Omega Red. Can the X-Men survive this latest threat to humanity and to the team?

snippet.title: X-Men: Season One
snippet.description: Jean Gray joins four other teenage mutants at Professor Xavier's school, where they must come to terms with their emerging powers, their emotions, and Xavier's relationship with the evil Magneto while fighting for their lives.

snippet.title: The Uncanny X-Men: From the Ashes
The Superhero Book: The Ultimate Encyclopedia of ... - Page 656
snippet.description: Perhaps no Marvel series was as completely faithful to its comic-book origins as was this X-Men. ... Following the first film's success, an X-Men sequel was immediately put into development, but some other X-projects would beat it to the punch.

snippet.title: X-men: Visionaries
snippet.description: Collects tales of the X-Men by a longtime writer of the comic book series as they battle evil on Earth and in outer space while trying to make a place for themselves and other mutants in the world.

snippet.title: Marvel Masterworks: The Uncanny X-Men \- - Volume 5
snippet.description: It's the definitive X-Men tale, painstakingly restored for the Marvel Masterworks. COLLECTING: X-Men 132-140, Annual 4, Phoenix: The Untold Story, Bizarre Adventures 27

snippet.title: X-Men: Enter The Phoenix
snippet.description: The X-Men are sent to the farthest regions of space to fight a desperate battle aboard an orbital space station. Upon their return, one hero undergoes a startling transformation, threatening the survival of the universe.
